text: Ubisoft Entertainment SA (; ; formerly Ubi Soft Entertainment SA) is a French video game publisher headquartered in Saint-Mand√©, with many development studios located in other countries worldwide. They are known for franchises such as Assassin's Creed, Driver, Far Cry, Just Dance, Prince of Persia, Rabbids, Rayman, Tom Clancy's, and Watch Dogs. ==References== Category:Technology companies of France Category:Video game companies of Europe
title: Ubisoft
